My Website and Tools

Tell about how you made your site and why you chose the tools you did. Briefly explain a challenge you experienced in setting up this site and how you solved it.

Well honestly I used Jekyll to build my site because when I googled "Best Site Generator 2017" this was at the top of the page here
I was originally going to setup my own theme, but due to time constraints I downloaded a theme and modified it to make it my own. I did run into a couple small issues. One issue I had
was with the jekyll-paginate gem, but I was able to edit my gemfile and resolve the issue. Most of the issues that I had were very minor and I was able to resolve them pretty quickly.
